ygData.subject: RE: Rathe Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is a cyclops in OOT you must kill for an item (don t remember what) for the new Jboots quest.  If its the ring of the ancients, you have that quest
ygData.messageBody:
> From: CYR, Thierry [mailto:tcyr@...]
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rathe Mountains
>
> From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>

> If it makes you feel better, we killed a named Cyc on gornit's island this
> weekend, took us about an hour and a half to kill him and all we got was a
> Pearl necklace, and one died doing it. He kept draining mana on all the
> casters, very unhealthy...
>
> Anyone know what the necklace is?

There is a cyclops in OOT you must kill for an item (don't remember what)
for the new Jboots quest. If its the ring of the ancients, you have that
quest item. If its anything else I'm a clueless bard!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 37 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
